name: LICUOS
tag_list: netting, payment, funding, funding-channel, supply-chain, b2b, business, invoice, account, account-payable, account-receivable, working-capital, cash-flow, invoice-discounting, discount, p2p-lending, p2p-finance, erp, sap, oracle, financial, enterprise, p
overview:
LICUOS is the global B2B payment platform where businesses can compensate and pay their commercial debts. The platform provides netting, payment and funding services for accounts receivable and payable to businesses, allowing them to reduce their dependence on the banking system and improve their working capital and cash flow management.

LICUOS gives businesses full control and visibility into the payment process and allows them to easily communicate and negotiate with their business partners at any point in time. By applying our solution, companies will achieve an important reduction in their funding needs and credit risk exposure.

LICUOS´ SaaS cloud-based patent pending technology is compatible with SAP, Oracle and most custom ERP systems and its integration requires little IT Support allowing a rapid deployment for businesses.

LICUOS is a joint venture between IDEON Financial Solutions and AVS.
